description: Janitorial Services for office trailers at Camp Ipperwash in Ontario
full_summary:
<details>
<summary>
EN438-239003 Request for Proposal: Janitorial Services for the Department of National Defence
</summary>

* **Reference Number:** WS3867826903-Doc3887621034
* **Publication Date:** February 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors to provide Janitorial Services for office trailers at the former Camp Ipperwash in Stony Point First Nation, Ontario, for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Contract Period:** The Contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2023, and continue until March 31, 2025.

**Scope of Work:** The successful Offeror will be responsible for providing Janitorial Services, including cleaning and maintaining the office trailers and associated facilities, in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* The lowest responsive bid will be the primary evaluation criterion.
* The Offeror's ability to provide the required Janitorial Services will also be evaluated.

**Trade Agreements:** This RFP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Contact Information:**
* Herb Choquette, PSPC
* Email: [herb.choquette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:herb.choquette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: [Not available]
* Fax: [Not available]

**Tender Documents:** The RFP document, including all relevant information and requirements, is available on the Ariba Discovery website.

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on March 13, 2023, by 14:00 EDT. **Late bids will not be accepted**.
</details>
